channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: An altercation in an Ohio parking lot spirals out of control; disaster strikes when a bus driver in Atlanta appears to fall asleep at the wheel; an irate driver's wrath is unleashed on two friends in Oklahoma.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: A man in San Diego strikes an SUV with a bat; a woman is sent flying by a garbage truck; a semi truck driver's life hangs in the balance when an erratic driver causes her rig to careen halfway off a bridge in Louisville.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: In Vernon, Calif., a motorcyclist escalates an altercation on the road by smashing a driver's rear windshield; when a driver in Flushing, N.Y., allegedly blocks a mobility van from unloading wheelchair passengers, bystanders intervene.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: In a Rhode Island drive-through, a family is horrified as an enraged woman appears to stab their vehicle; an off-duty officer in Alabama is run down outside his home by a stranger's SUV.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: A raging back and forth between three vehicles ends with a man being rammed head on by a truck; carjackers relentlessly pursue a terrified driver; an angry motorcyclist confronts a driver and is met with a baseball bat.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: In Sacramento, Calif., two motorists attempt to out-threaten each other over an alleged tailgating incident; in Las Vegas, a driver upset at being allegedly cut off confronts another motorist at a stoplight.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: A taxi driver is held at gunpoint in Pennsylvania; a raging driver threatens others with an ax in Texas.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: In Nebraska, an SUV runs into a sanitation worker whose truck blocks its way; a driver in Las Vegas falls out of his vehicle while doing donuts in a parking lot; in Los Angeles, a stolen utility vehicle goes on a wild rampage.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: On a rural highway in Iowa, a driver and his passenger both fall asleep while on the road; in a San Francisco parking lot, a woman berates another driver who she claims parked too close to her car.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: Drinks are thrown, fists fly and a car is rammed during an argument at a Houston intersection; a lane change miscalculation turns into a nightmare when a semi truck rolls over on a highway; two drivers settle their differences in a refreshing way.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: A traffic stop in Florida goes off the rails when a CEO loses his cool with an officer; a woman exits her car with a big dog during a confrontation with another driver; a Nebraska motorist falls unconscious while cruising on the interstate.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: A driver stumbles through a field sobriety test; saving an unconscious driver who crashed into a bus; drivers witness a swarm of rats spilling out of a truck; a driver captures an out-of-control semi truck barreling into stopped traffic.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: Tourists in Mexico on a sightseeing detour are stopped by a group of men with guns; in Oklahoma, a semi truck driver launches off an overpass; on a Utah highway, a discarded piece of office furniture becomes a dangerous projectile.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: A property manager in California is hit by a car after an altercation with its driver; in Oklahoma, a semi hauling cars gets stuck at a crossing with a train fast approaching; a routine call for two ambulance workers in Chicago is interrupted.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: In Santa Clarita, Calif., a motorcyclist kicks a car and sets off a catastrophic chain reaction on the highway; a bicyclist and driver in New York City have a heated confrontation over blocking the bike lane.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: In Canton, Ohio, a horn honk on the road allegedly leads to a man wreaking havoc on a woman's car; in Jonesboro, Ark., chaos ensues when a suspect manages to break free from his handcuffs and holds a lighter flame to the seat.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: At a red light in Arizona, a car sideswipes the door on another driver's vehicle during a heated road rage encounter; two drivers get into a yelling match as they attempt to squeeze by each other on a narrow street in the Boston suburbs.
